author: J. Edward Moreno
title: Kentucky warns of fake coronavirus testing sites: reports
description: Kentucky officials are warning residents of fake coronavirus testing sites in the Louisville area, according to the...
content:
Kentucky officials are warning residents of fake coronavirus testing sites in the Louisville area, according to the Louisville Courier-Journal.
Medical marketing companies offering coronavirus tests, including one that promises results in 24 hours, have char… [+1209 chars]
